synopsis:
Chisato Mizusawa is a reserved but excellent and pretty assistant manager in her company. She has a secret that only her husband Sora knows, which is that she likes drinking alcohol, and she can become very cute when she is drunk! Even tonight, she gets relaxed (with the phrase "Shifuku~") and drunk with the cocktail Sora makesâ™¥. It's a "Yoidere (Drunken Dere)" cocktail comedy of Japan's closest husband and wife.

(Source: MAL News)

title.jp: Osake wa Fuufu ni Natte kara
